title: Oil chiefs grilled on climate change disinformation
content: The hearing in Congress marks the first time oil executives have answered climate questions under oath
en_title: Oil chiefs grilled on climate change disinformation
en_content: The hearing in Congress marks the first time oil executives have answered climate questions under oath

title: Oil chiefs grilled on climate change disinformation

title: Biden announces revamped $1.75tn spending plan
content: The president said that his party was "on board" though the scaled-back plan's fate is uncertain.
en_content: The president said that his party was "on board" though the scaled-back plan's fate is uncertain.

title: Facebook changes its name to Meta in rebrand
content: The social media giant says the new name will better encompass what it does.
en_title: Facebook changes its name to Meta in rebrand
en_content: The social media giant says the new name will better encompass what it does.

title: Moscow shops and restaurants shut in new lockdown
content: Russia closes non-essential services and sends workers home amid record Covid deaths.
en_title: Moscow shops and restaurants shut in new lockdown
en_content: Russia closes non-essential services and sends workers home amid record Covid deaths.

title: Film-maker who exposed East Timor massacre dies
content: Max Stahl went from children's TV host to award-winning film-maker and East Timor national hero.
en_title: Film-maker who exposed East Timor massacre dies
en_content: Max Stahl went from children's TV host to award-winning film-maker and East Timor national hero.

title: Saudi child protester who faced execution released
content: Ali al-Nimr, who was arrested when he was 17, was originally sentenced to death by beheading.
en_title: Saudi child protester who faced execution released
en_content: Ali al-Nimr, who was arrested when he was 17, was originally sentenced to death by beheading.

title: DNA confirms man is Sitting Bull's great-grandson
content: A sample of the Native American leader's hair confirms the identity of his great-grandson.
en_title: DNA confirms man is Sitting Bull's great-grandson
en_content: A sample of the Native American leader's hair confirms the identity of his great-grandson.
